help-file.title: EPIC
help-file.content:
Once a character reaches level 50, they can begin to accumulate Epic Points. You can gain these points from either finding and touching the may runestones and monoliths hidden about the lands, or by tasting the blood of your enemies. The epic points will accumulate, and once you reach a certain amount you will gain a skill point. Skill points can be used for several things in the realms, most notably the advancement of epic skills. The epic skills list as follows:
Anatomy Advanced Meditation Summon Blizzard Chant Mastery Summon Familiar Hone Weapon
It is also rumored that 50 Epic Points are required to venture into the realm of multiclassing, and that skill points have the capability to reset one's chosen path.
